svg.text: Cloud-Native Monitoring for AI/ML Services & Infrastructure
Cross-cloud dashboard, aggregated views, consolidated alerts (Future Phase)
BigQuery Export ‚Ä¢ Budget API ‚Ä¢ Recommender ‚Ä¢ Asset Inventory
Cost Explorer ‚Ä¢ AWS Budgets ‚Ä¢ Compute Optimizer ‚Ä¢ AWS Config
Cost Management ‚Ä¢ Azure Budgets ‚Ä¢ Azure Advisor ‚Ä¢ Resource Graph
Azure Monitor ‚Ä¢ Event Grid ‚Ä¢ Azure Functions
ü§ñ AI/ML-Specific Monitoring Features (Common Across All Agents)
Compare GPT-4 vs Gemini vs Claude
"How much did we spend on Gemini/GPT-4 this month?" ‚Ä¢ "Compare token costs by model" ‚Ä¢ "Alert me if AI spend exceeds $500/day"
$500 WARNING ‚Ä¢ $1K ELEVATED ‚Ä¢ $2.5K CRITICAL (stop endpoints) ‚Ä¢ $5K EMERGENCY (disable APIs)
Summary: Multi-Agent AI Cost Monitoring Platform
3 Cloud-Native Agents: GCP (Vertex AI) ‚Ä¢ AWS (Bedrock/SageMaker) ‚Ä¢ Azure (Azure OpenAI) ‚Äî Each using only native cloud APIs
AI/ML Focus: Token tracking ‚Ä¢ Model comparison ‚Ä¢ Training costs ‚Ä¢ Endpoint monitoring ‚Ä¢ AI-specific budgets & circuit breakers
Key Principle: Each agent monitors ONLY its cloud ‚Äî no external APIs, no proxies
AI Cost Monitoring ‚Äî Multi-Agent Architecture v1.0 ‚Äî February 2025
